Introduction


I’m a graduate student pursuing my Master’s in Applied Business Analytics at Boston University. I enjoy exploring how data reveals patterns, supports better decisions, and drives meaningful outcomes.


My interests lie in business analytics — applying analytical reasoning and performance insights to guide strategy, streamline processes, and deliver measurable business value.
